summary: After a terrible day, two good friends and housemates find the outside world converted into a featureless and empty white void.
cast: David Hewlett|Andrew Miller|Gordon Pinsent|Marie-Josée Croze|Andrew Lowery|Elana Shilling|Soo Garay|Martin Roach|Angelo Tsarouchas|Rick Parker|Maurice Dean Wint
title: Nothing
